description_html: Light dances through a dazzling array of tiny bubbles within the solid mass of each glass crystal ball. A single source of LED illumination becomes refracted and diffused from within its effervescent volume. Champagne Bubbles can be hung singly or in multiple arrangements from a range of canopy sizes. Champagne Bubbles can be hung as a sole glass ball or in configurations of 3, 6, 9, 12, or 24.
